column1: Table 3a. Côte d’Ivoire: Fiscal Operations of the Central Government, 2016–23

Prog.       Est.      Prog.      Proj.     Prog.      Proj.                 Projections
Change in domestic arrears and float (excl. on debt service)          78.9         -199.2 -200.2          -50.0    -50.0      -25.0      -25.0     -25.0      -25.0      0.0      0.0

In 2017, includes one-off payments to soldiers of about FCFA 101 billion.
In the CFA franc zone, Fund resources are channeled via the regional central bank that provides equivalent domestic currency credit to the relevant government.
